title: List of all Androidffmpeg   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidffmpeg   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: ffmpeg-android-java
repoList.description: Android java library for FFmpeg binary compiled using https://github.com/writingminds/ffmpeg-android

repoList.name: AndroidAudioConverter
repoList.description: Convert audio files inside your Android app easily. Supported formats: AAC, MP3, M4A, WMA, WAV and FLAC.

repoList.name: FFmpegVideoRecorder
repoList.description: Customizable Android video recorder library that can combine multiple videos

repoList.name: KotlinFFMpeg
repoList.description: Examples of using FFMpeg library on Android with Kotlin

repoList.name: FFmpegLibrary
repoList.description: 将视频批量解码为一帧一帧的jpg图片，并能执行FFmpeg命令。

repoList.name: WhatTheCodec
repoList.description: A sample app that uses FFmpeg's shared libraries

repoList.name: PlayPicdio
repoList.description: 安卓平台下，图片或视频转化为ascii，图片转化成低多边形风格图形，emoji表情填充图片，合并视频用到ffmpeg库。已实现带色彩的ascii码图片或视频.On the Android platform, the picture or video is converted to ascii, the picture is converted into a low-poly style graphic, the emoji expression is filled with the picture, and the merged video is used in the ffmpeg library. Adding color ascii code pictures or videos later. Androidプラットフォームでは、画像またはビデオはASCIIに変換され、画像は低ポリスタイルのグラフィックに変換され、絵文字表現は画像で埋められ、マージされたビデオはffmpegライブラリで使用されます。 カラーASCIIコードの写真やビデオを後で追加する

repoList.name: instantVideoRecord
repoList.description: No-latency video recording library for Android using ffmpeg

repoList.name: Downloader-M3u8
repoList.description: Download M3u8 easily with FFMpeg library in Android

repoList.name: AndroidFFmpegX264
repoList.description: The ffmpeg library with x264 for android platform, it compiled by android ndk tools. The libffmpeg-x264.so could be used in other apps.
